edge: Edward 'Teddy' Daniels travels to Ashecliffe Hospital for a case investigation.
Edward 'Teddy' Daniels is a U.S. Marshal who travels to Ashecliffe Hospital for a case investigation.
Chuck Aule travels with Edward 'Teddy' Daniels to Ashecliffe Hospital for the same case investigation.
Rachel Solando is a patient in Ashecliffe Hospital who has gone missing during the time of Edward 'Teddy' Daniels and Chuck Aule's investigation.
Dr. John Cawley is the psychiatrist in charge of Ashecliffe Hospital during Edward 'Teddy' Daniels and Chuck Aule's investigation.
Lester Sheehan was treating Rachel Solando at Ashecliffe Hospital before going on vacation during her disappearance.
Dolores Daniels is Edward 'Teddy' Daniels' wife who died in a fire.
Edward 'Teddy' Daniels believes Andrew Laeddis is involved in Rachel Solando's disappearance.
Patient George Noyce appears to know Edward 'Teddy' Daniels and warns him not to trust Chuck.
Patients at Ashecliffe Hospital are being taken to a lighthouse to be lobotomized, according to George Noyce.
Teddy is the alias used by Andrew Laeddis, a U.S. Marshal who was incarcerated at Ashecliffe for murdering his manic depressive wife after she drowned their three children.
Andrew Laeddis's manic depressive wife, who burned down their apartment and subsequently drowned herself along with their three children.
The relationship between Cawley and Teddy, where Cawley believes that Teddy does not have a partner and insists that he arrived on the island alone.
The relationship between Chuck and Teddy, where Chuck arrives at the lighthouse and reveals himself to be Dr. Sheehan.
The relationship between Solando and Teddy, where she claims to be a former psychiatrist who discovered clandestine experiments to develop mind control but was forcibly committed.
The relationship between Cawley and Solando, where Cawley denies the existence of Solando when Teddy confronts him.
The relationship between Naehring and Teddy, where he attempts to sedate him when Teddy breaks into the lighthouse.
wife who drowned their three children and burned down their apartment
alternate persona created due to guilt and delusion
delusional belief of being a Marshal
violent and conspiracy theorist persona created by Andrew
lucidness and regression under medical observation
confusion between his true persona and a delusional one named Chuck
desire to leave the hospital due to delusions
Andrew's confusion between his true persona and a delusional one named Chuck
signals to Cawley regarding Andrew's delusional behavior
